YaleBei163.First Lines:
Thu that art a gentilmannAnd gentilmanys game wylt
                    lere…
YaleBei163.Last Lines:
…I pray to god bothe nyȝth and dayeAlle fauconerys he
                    saue fro drenkelyng
YaleBei163.Editions:
Danielsson,  Bror. 
             “The Percy Poem on Falconry” 
             Studier i Modern Språkvetenskap.
         n.s. 3 (1970): 5–60.
